alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 21 at 2:05AM MST until November 21 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Roosevelt County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog may lead to slick conditions over bridges and culverts, including portions of U.S. Highways 60, 70, and 380. A thin coating of ice may form on walkways and other elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County
